entry.data:
SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH THIS MORNING

CLEAR, COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
